DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect carbohydrate familiar breakfast meal glycemic response , subjective appetite , food intake normal weight ( NW ) overweight obese ( OW/OB ) child .
DOC.brief_title: Dietary Carbohydrate Consumption Breakfast Food Intake , Glycemic Response , Subjective Appetite
DOC.detailed_description: Regular breakfast eat NW OW/OB child , 9-14 year age , participate experiment . Four isocaloric ( 450 kcal ) breakfast ( eggs side French fry , mash potato , bean , control breakfast milk , cereal toast ) breakfast skipping examine . On five separate morning , 7 day apart 12 hour overnight fast , participant receive one four breakfast skip breakfast , randomize counterbalanced order . Participants give ad libitum lunch 3 hour breakfast parent report rest day food record food intake analysis . Blood glucose measure via finger-prick baseline , 30 , 60 , 120 , 180 minute breakfast consumption . Subjective appetite measure visual analogue scale baseline every 15 minute 1 hour , every hour 3 hour .
DOC.criteria: 9 14 year age healthy , born term take medication allergy sensitivity potato , egg , gluten , dairy , bean NW ( 5th 85th BMI percentile age gender ) OW/OB ( > 85th BMI percentile age gender ) food sensitivity , allergy , dietary restriction health , learn , emotional , behavioural problem receive medication
